summary: This is a retexture of the "Nightingale retex - Black Sacrament - craftable ninja armor" (by AmethystDeceiver). It changes the cloak into a cape (like the one used by nightingale armor). Comes in two versions: Plain and "Dovahkiin edition"
descriptionHtml:
This is a retexture of the "Nightingale retex - Black Sacrament - craftable ninja armor" (by AmethystDeceiver). It changes the cloak into a cape (like the one used by nightingale armor)

This is just a retexture, so you still need the main mod to use it. The main file can be downloaded here:
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=5696

Added Dovahkiin edition of the retexture, which adds the Empire symbol to the back of the cape. Hope you like it :)

Added torn edition of the retexture upon request. It isn't perfect but hope you like it :)

Added Dragon edition of the retexture, thanks to Abakus for the idea.

Added Dark Brotherhood white and red edition.

Added Black Sacrament edition. It isn't perfect but I hope you like it :)

Updated to version 3.0 and uploaded some other variants I had made but not uploaded.
If any of the uploads don't work, please tell me so I can check if I forgot to modify the file structure.

If you wear the Black Sacrament armor or other armors which have a flat back, the cape will fit well and will not have pieces of the armor passing trough. However, other armors with pieces on the back will pass trough the cape.

I hope you like and endorse :)


[size="5"]Note:[/size]
I made a quick fix for the v2.5 of the main mod. I'll also be using the main mod version numbers as my version numbers.

This should also work for v2.6. Just remember to uninstall my mod before updating, then reinstalling it after updating.

Also note that this will effect the reflections for the cloak of other chainmail versions, since they refer to the same file. I cannot avoid this, but if someone is bothered by it, post a comment and I'll do a version which replaces the black leather version, which wouldn't affect the reflections for chainmail cloaks.


[size="5"]Recommended:[/size]
For those who want to equip the cape and an amulet (or more) at the same time will love this mod:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=6703


A Steel Heater Shield (by Abakus)
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=5916


[size="5"]Credits:[/size]
Nightingale retex - Black Sacrament - craftable ninja armor (by AmethystDeceiver)
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=5696
Without his mod, this cape wouldn't exist. So be sure to endorse his mod :)


[size="5"]Other:[/size]
Shadowmere retexture used in one of the images can be found here:
http://skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=7024

Ebony Mail retexture:
http://skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=7085
